Poliovirus Infection (Tests for poliovirus by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    53645-8 Polio virus identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    60546-9 Polio virus identified [Type] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    73907-8 Polio virus identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
